sources.title: Get Rich Quick Porky (1937)
sources.description: Get Rich Quick Porky is a 1937 Warner Bros. Looney Tunes cartoon directed by Bob Clampett. The short was released on August 28, 1937, and stars Porky Pig. Watch on RetroFlix.org:Â  https://retroflix.org/get-rich-quick-porky-1937/

sources.title: Get Rich Quick Porky (1937)
sources.description: Porky gets talked into investing his savings into a phony oil field by a slick con man.

metadata.Plot: Porky and Gabby are about to deposit their savings in the bank when a shyster sells them a lot that's full of oil because he planted it there. Meanwhile, a dog trying to bury a bone has lots more luck finding oil than Porky and Gabby until the shyster shuts off the oil-filled sprinklers. Meanwhile, Gabby hits oil for real.
metadata.Actors: Mel Blanc, Billy Bletcher, Earle Hodgins
